thread.title: Cireson Supports Premier Technology Conference IT/Dev Conne
thread.title_full: Cireson Supports Premier Technology Conference IT/Dev Conne

author: Cireson
title: Cireson Supports Premier Technology Conference IT/Dev Conne
text:
SAN DIEGO , Sept. For the first time, Cireson announces their Silver Sponsorship of IT/Dev Connections, an education centric technology event in Las Vegas, Nevada , September 14-17 . As a leading System Center Partner and community voice, Cireson is proud to join this conference for the first time, incorporating expert speakers such as Wally Mead , Chris Ross , and Pete Zerger to the impressive line-up of top community voices on stage that week. Cireson looks forward to this becoming a mainstay of their industry event involvement for many years to come. Throughout this several day event, Cireson will showcase their recently released Password Reset app and will also offer expert insights into service, asset, and identity management. The Cireson team will also be on hand to offer their expertise and look forward to connecting with new and familiar faces alike.
Commenting on Cireson's attendance, Corporate Practice Lead, Chris Ross comments, "IT/Dev Connections has become one of the leading forums for deep and immersive learning with half a dozen tracks and nearly 200 sessions. Cireson is excited to attend, sponsor and present several sessions and share our vision of service, asset and identity management to this amazing community."
Those who plan to attend IT/Dev Connections can connect with Cireson in the following ways:
Visit the team at booth #14 in the expo hall. Learn from Wally Mead , Chris Ross , and Pete Zerger with Cireson sessions throughout the event. Click here for session details. Connect with the team at any point during the event – they would love to answer your questions! Individuals unable to attend but still interested in connecting with the Cireson team can enquire via their Contact Us page. Also, don't miss recent news regarding the company, including the Cireson Platform and their own upcoming conference, Innovate 15 .
About Cireson
Born in 2012, Cireson was founded on a simple, powerful idea: to be the forward thinkers on all things Microsoft Cloud and System Center. Today, our values from the beginning remain the same; keep it genuine, do the right thing, and listen to customers.
As a world leader in Microsoft Cloud and System Center, our mission is to make your working life ridiculously more productive by bringing service and asset management together - that's the Cireson Platform.
Taking pride in our expertise, we proudly boast some of the brightest and most fanatical IT professionals in the industry. From the Cireson Platform to Consulting Services and community engagements – everything we do is designed to push technical brilliance forward.
Our headquarters are located in sunny San Diego with offices throughout North America , Australia , and the United Kingdom .
